title: Percival Landing Park
description: Percival Landing is one of Olympia's three waterfront parks and is located on the east side of Budd Bay on the southern most tip of Puget Sound.

title: Tolmie State Park
description: Tolmie State Park is a public recreation area covering 154 acres on Nisqually Beach on Puget Sound, eight miles northeast of Olympia, Washington

title: Capitol Lake
description: Capitol Lake is a 3 kilometer long, 260-acre artificial lake at the mouth of Deschutes River in Tumwater/Olympia, Washington.

title: Millersylvania State Park
description: Millersylvania State Park is a public recreation area located on Deep Lake eight miles south of Olympia, Washington.

title: Rock Candy Mountain Trailhead
address: 10430 Rock Candy Mountain Rd SW, Olympia, WA 98512
description: Outdoor recreation area featuring kid-friendly hikes and an extensive network of trails for ATVs and overlanding.

title: Evergreen State College
description: The Evergreen State College is a public liberal arts college in Olympia, Washington. Founded in 1967.

title: Woodard Bay Conservation Area
address: Woodard Bay Conservation Area, Olympia, WA 98506
description: Woodard Bay Natural Resources Conservation Area is a natural reserve in Olympia, Washington, protected under the Washington Natural Areas Program.

title: Boston Harbor Marina
description: Boston Harbor Marina is a marina located in the Boston Harbor neighborhood of Olympia, Washington. It offers boat slips, fuel, and amenities for boaters and visitors.
